articles.title: BREAKING | MTN is in talks to buy Telkom - TechCentral
articles.description: MTN Group has entered into discussions to acquire Telkom. The talks are at an early stage, the parties said, and might not result in a deal.
articles.content:
MTN Group has entered into discussions to acquire Telkom, the companies said on Friday. The news sent Telkom’s share price rocketing higher.
